label: Niveau de dioxyde d'azote
description: Get the health concern level from a nitrogen dioxide sensor

supportedNitrogenDioxideValues.label: Supported nitrogen dioxide values
supportedNitrogenDioxideValues.description: The list of nitrogen dioxide health concern values that the device supports. Is optional, defaults to all values if not set.

nitrogenDioxideHealthConcern.label: Niveau de dioxyde d'azote
nitrogenDioxideHealthConcern.description: The current health concern level due to nitrogen dioxide.
